title: No Net
description: What would you do if the Internet mysteriously vanished? No Net is the ambitious novel that explores how much—or how little—people care about the beloved World Wide Web. Spanning across 20 APPs, with a hearty assortment of varied characters, this fictional tale begs you to just take a moment and think about how deep we've all been sinking in a digital quicksand...
author: Noah Nichols
